content:
ICodeParser Interface

Definition

Defines an interface for parsing code into a CodeCompileUnit.

In this Article

public interface ICodeParser

Remarks

Developers of compilers can implement this interface to support code parsing by designers.

Methods

Parse(TextReader)

When implemented in a derived class, compiles the specified text stream into a CodeCompileUnit.

public System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit Parse (System.IO.TextReader codeStream);
codeStream
TextReader

A TextReader that can be used to read the code to be compiled.

Returns
CodeCompileUnit

A CodeCompileUnit that contains a representation of the parsed code.
